credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
title: Sampler
medium:
Technique: cross, stem, double-running, satin, eyelet, back, scotch, and buttonhole embroidery stitches
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on plain weave cotton foundation
description: Sampler with many bands of geometric patterns, in purples, blues, greens, yellows, pinks, and reds. One section at the left side is much coarser in quality, and may have been worked by a different hand.
name: Sampler
